hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah:that the Messenger of Allah said: 'Breast-feeding makes unlawful (for marriages) the same things that blood tie make unlawful.”

chapter.ara-name: باب يَحْرُمُ مِنَ الرِّضَاعِ مَا يَحْرُمُ مِنَ النَّسَبِ
chapter.eng-name: What is unlawful due to lineage is unlawful due to breastfeeding
